comments:
Eclipse version: nightly build May27 (problem observed in F1 as well)
J9 Plugin: 20020519 org.eclipse.jdt.launching.j9 
Computer: Celeron 400, 128MB

When I try to debug a program with J9, a proxy is launched but Eclipse itself 
seems to be frozen (despite processor consumption and hdd usage close to 0). I 
have really high timeouts set.
